Text: LazyTrader Trading TipsLazy Traders Did you know that you can trade from AM EST until PM EST The old to routine has fallen by the wayside and it sometimes is much more profitable to trade early in the morning and after PM because more news comes out before and after PM than during the day What do you think happens if Microsoft announces that it is buying a small company at PM Exactly The small companys shares will go through the roof at and will continue to go up until PM But they will probably fall at AM the next morning because people are taking profit This is the scenario Michael Crowders Chatroom uses to rack up profits of over in the last eight weeks and you can become part of that as well when you learn to DayTrade with the Lazy DayTrader System Check it out at How much time do you have to spend in front of your computer If you have as little as one hour a day you can trade successfully The new Nasdaq trading rules On September Nasdaq came out with new rules which in effect prevents people with less than to cash their trades more than once every days So what you do is divide your money in and trade that amount every day problem solved You can still open an account for as little as with and for as little as with both reputable and reliable online brokers How to minimize your risk and maximize your profits Learn to DayTrade with the Lazy Daytrader System Papertrade until you are successful Join Michaels Chatroom and learn how and when he calls his picks Start trading with VERY small amounts of real money Build up confidence and take your timeHow long did you go to school If you follow these rules you minimize your risk and maximize your profits And remember that stocks will ALWAYS go up even in bad and uncertain economic times when any of these circumstances happen Large company buys small company small companys shares will always go up Company comes out with cure for cancer shares will always go up Company gets exclusive such as rights to sell telephones in Chinashares will always go up Company has mind blowing earnings such as times last quarter shares will always go up Have a nice day and email me with questions Frank vanderlugt To be removed just click on profit is the maximum you could have made in the last weeks if you would have bought Michaels Stockpicks when he called them and you would have sold at the high for the day To be able to sell at the high for the day consistently is not realistic The risk factor is high in stock trading and only Risk Capital or Risk Funds should be used in such trading A person who does not have extra Risk Capital or Risk Funds that they can afford to lose should not trade in the market No SAFE trading system has ever been devised and no one including us can guarantee profits or freedom
